results.thought: Compile the source and run checksec to inventory enabled mitigations and record the results.
results.notes: Fast recon of mitigations guides exploit approach; minimal setup.

results.thought: Use a cyclic pattern with gdb to crash the program and compute the exact RIP/EIP overwrite offset.
results.notes: Confirms control and yields exact offset; crucial for payload layout.

results.thought: Disassemble the binary and enumerate symbols and ROP gadgets, recording addresses and simple gadgets.
results.notes: Symbol/ROP index aids later payload crafting; may vary with PIE.
